name: Santa Claus (itch) (VaLArDem)
description:
In this game, you are the kind of Santa who must protect the snowmen from evil spirits.

The game is made for android.
-----------------
The control
-----------------
You have two joints. The first one you control the character, and the second one rotates the weapon around its axis. There is also a button for shooting.
-----------------
Gameplay
-----------------
You have to kill ghosts while protecting the snowman. For killing a transfer, you get coins, thanks to them you can buy upgrades (Restore life and increase reload speed).
Also in this game there are arrows that indicate the appearance of an enemy at this place.

Game version 0.1
